Key Match Events: Daryl Mitchell scored 59* (30) in the second innings, changing the game with a 27-run 20th over.
Washington Sundar scored 50 (28) in the first innings but could not maintain the form in the second.
Mitchell Santner took 2/11 in the first innings and 2/22 in the second, contributing significantly to New Zealand's victory.
Pre-Game Insights: No specific pre-game insights were mentioned in the article.
Post-Match Reflections: Daryl Mitchell expressed satisfaction with his contribution and praised his teammates' bowling performance.
Mitchell Santner commented on the unexpected spin and the effectiveness of the new ball.
Hardik Pandya acknowledged New Zealand's better cricket performance and the impact of Washington Sundar's all-round contribution.
Michael Bracewell mentioned the game's outcome as a positive for New Zealand, despite some challenges.
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand won by 21 runs, taking a 1-0 lead in the three-match T20I series.
The game started with India electing to field first after winning the toss.
